Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product comes with exceptional features and quality that truly stand out in its category. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, we're extending an exclusive offer to you today. For a limited time only, you can purchase this product for $95. We believe this price reflects the high-quality experience you're about to enjoy. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your life with our top-tier product. If you have any questions or need further information, please let me know. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
